original_text: Three times the donkey saw me and turned back. If it had not done that, I would have killed you. But I would not have killed your donkey.’
korean_text: 나귀가 나를 보고 이같이 세 번을 돌이켜 내 앞에서 피하였느니라 나귀가 만일 돌이켜 나를 피하지 아니하였더면 내가 벌써 너를 죽이고 나귀는 살렸으리라

sentences.original_text: Three times the donkey saw me
If it had not done that
But I would not have killed your donkey
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 네 나귀를 죽이지 않았을 것이다
